name: Garden of Revelation
effect: *Beside the road you see a beautiful garden filled with flowers in full bloom. A monk sitting in the middle invites you to meditate with him.*
flavor_text:
*Each player chooses one option:**
Draw 4 cards either from your discard pile or your deck. Then Remove any number of [Spell](../spells/index.md) or [Ability](../abilities/index.md) cards from your hand. For every two cards removed this way, you can perform **Search(2)** the [Spell](../spells/index.md) deck or the [Ability](../abilities/index.md) deck. After that, discard all cards from hand and draw up to your :hand:.

— OR —

Leave and gain nothing.

___

*Beside the road you see a beautiful garden filled with flowers in full bloom. A monk sitting in the middle invites you to meditate with him.
